short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly build test flows for Subject7's simple and scalable end-to-end automation platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Subject7 Recorder enables users to capture user interactions with a web page into Subject7 commands. It is the only recorder with smart XPath generation based on a proprietary algorithm matured over many years. For enhancement requests, send emails to info@subject-7.com
